Medford.Zoryan Institute:
The Zoryan Institute is an American non-profit organization and think tank first established in 1982 in Cambridge, Massachusetts, that focuses on genocide, diaspora, and Armenian studies. It sponsors, supports, and encourages multidisciplinary scholarly research and documentation, including conferences and publications.


== History ==
It comprises two sub-organizations: the Zoryan Institute for Contemporary Research and Documentation, established in Cambridge, Massachusetts in 1982, and the Zoryan Institute of Canada, Inc., which was incorporated as a nonprofit research institute in Toronto in 1984.
